name: Conveyor Conductor
description:
GAMEPAD IS REQUIRED

Conveyor Conductor is a joystick-controlled baroque rhythm game, where you need to sort boxes by pattern without mistakes or letting them pile up.

Right now, the project is only one music piece, and I don't plan on revisiting it anytime soon, but maybe one day!

Music piece is Vivaldi's Summer Movement 3 - Presto! by John Harrison with the Wichita State University Chamber Players

NOTE: Your Mileage May Vary with different types of controllers with this game, testing was limited.
